item.content:encoded:
The first Coder Dojo is opening on theÂ Saturday 23rd of July at the National Software Centre, Mahon, Cork. Registration is fromÂ 11am to 12pm and the session will run from 1pm to 5pm.

They will be looking at the basics of coding in HTML and CSS and then having an open coding session.

It’s open to all ages and all levels of experience, justÂ register here online .

Head on over to their blog for more info.

Note that they are also looking for volunteers and spaces in Galway and Limerick as well.
